TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IReadOnlyDictionary`2<TKey, TValue> implements class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<valuetype System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair`2<!TKey, !TValue>>, class System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyCollection`1<valuetype System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair`2<!TKey, !TValue>>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public Interface IReadOnlyDictionary(Of TKey, TValue) Implements IEnumerable(Of KeyValuePair(Of TKey, TValue)), IReadOnlyCollection(Of KeyValuePair(Of TKey, TValue))

generic <typename TKey, typename TValue> public interface class IReadOnlyDictionary : System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<System::Collections::Generic::KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue>>, System::Collections::Generic::IReadOnlyCollection<System::Collections::Generic::KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue>>

typeparam.name: TKey
typeparam.span: 唯讀字典中的索引鍵類型。

span.span: The type of keys in the read-only dictionary.
The type of values in the read-only dictionary.

summary.span: 代表索引鍵/值組的泛型唯讀集合。

span.span: Represents a generic read-only collection of key/value pairs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個項目是儲存在索引鍵/值配對物件。Each element is a key/value pair that is stored in a object. 每個組必須具有唯一索引鍵。Each pair must have a unique key. 實作會有所不同是否允許您指定的金鑰`null`。Implementations can vary in whether they allow you to specify a key that is `null`. 這個值可以是`null`並不需要是唯一的。The value can be `null` and does not have to be unique. 介面可讓包含的索引鍵和要列舉的值，但它並不代表任何特定排序順序。The interface allows the contained keys and values to be enumerated, but it does not imply any particular sort order. `foreach` C# 語言的陳述式 (`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中`for each`c + + 中) 需要的集合中每個項目類型。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`For Each` in Visual Basic, `for each` in C++) requires the type of each element in the collection. 因為每個項目介面的索引鍵/值組，此項目類型不是索引鍵的類型或值的類型。Because each element of the interface is a key/value pair, the element type is not the type of the key or the type of the value. 相反地，項目型別是，如下列範例所示。Instead, the element type is , as the following example illustrates. [!code-cpp[Generic.IDictionary#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.IDictionary/cpp/source2.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[Generic.IDictionary#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.IDictionary/CS/source2.cs#11)] [!code-vb[Generic.IDictionary#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.IDictionary/VB/source2.vb#11)] `foreach`陳述式是列舉值的包裝函式; 它允許讀取集合中，不寫入集合。The `foreach` statement is a wrapper around the enumerator; it allows only reading from the collection, not writing to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作可以改變它們如何判定相等的物件。例如，實作的類別可能會使用屬性，或它可能會實作方法。Implementations can vary in how they determine the equality of objects; for example, the class that implements might use the property, or it might implement the method. 實作有所不同是否允許`key`是`null`。Implementations can vary in whether they allow `key` to be `null`.

span.span: The element that has the specified key in the read-only dictionary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可讓您可以使用下列語法存取集合中的特定元素： `myCollection[key]` (`myCollection(key)`在 Visual Basic 中)。This property lets you access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[key]` (`myCollection(key)` in Visual Basic). 實作可能會判斷物件是否相等： 例如，實作的類別可能會使用屬性，或它可能會實作方法。Implementations can vary in how they determine the equality of objects: for example, the class that implements might use the property, or it might implement the method. 實作有所不同是否允許`key`是`null`。Implementations can vary in whether they allow `key` to be `null`.

exception.span: 屬性已擷取，並且找不到 。

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<TKey> Keys { get; }
.property instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!TKey> Keys
Public ReadOnly Property Keys As IEnumerable(Of TKey)
public: property System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<TKey> ^ Keys { System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<TKey> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得可列舉集合，其中包含唯讀字典中的索引鍵。

span.span: Gets an enumerable collection that contains the keys in the read-only dictionary.

value.span: 包含唯讀字典中索引鍵的可列舉集合。

span.span: An enumerable collection that contains the keys in the read-only dictionary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可列舉集合中的索引鍵的順序並未指定，但實作必須保證的索引鍵是在所傳回的可列舉集合中的對應值的順序相同屬性。The order of the keys in the enumerable collection is unspecified, but the implementation must guarantee that the keys are in the same order as the corresponding values in the enumerable collection that is returned by the property.

public: bool TryGetValue(TKey key, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] TValue % value);

span.span: The key to locate.

param.name: value
param.span: 當這個方法傳回時，如果找到索引鍵，則為與指定索引鍵建立關聯的值；否則為「值」參數的類型預設值。

span.span: When this method returns, the value associated with the specified key, if the key is found; otherwise, the default value for the type of the value parameter.

param.span: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

summary.span: 取得與指定之索引鍵相關聯的值。

span.span: Gets the value that is associated with the specified key.

returns.span: 如果實作 介面之物件包含具有指定之索引鍵的項目，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the object that implements the interface contains an element that has the specified key; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會結合的功能方法和屬性。This method combines the functionality of the method and the property. 如果找不到索引鍵，`value`參數取得類型的適當預設值`TValue`: 0 （零） 的整數類型，例如`false`針對布林類型，和`null`參考類型。If the key is not found, the `value` parameter gets the appropriate default value for the type `TValue`: for example, 0 (zero) for integer types, `false` for Boolean types, and `null` for reference types.

span.span: is .

.property instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!TValue> Values
Public ReadOnly Property Values As IEnumerable(Of TValue)
public: property System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<TValue> ^ Values { System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<TValue> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得可列舉集合，其中包含唯讀字典中的值。

span.span: Gets an enumerable collection that contains the values in the read-only dictionary.

value.span: 包含唯讀字典中之值的可列舉集合。

span.span: An enumerable collection that contains the values in the read-only dictionary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可列舉集合中的值的順序並未指定，但實作必須保證的值是在所傳回的可列舉集合中的對應索引鍵的順序相同屬性。The order of the values in the enumerable collection is unspecified, but the implementation must guarantee that the values are in the same order as the corresponding keys in the enumerable collection that is returned by the property.
